00033 #ifndef DH_POCKET
00034 #define DH_POCKET
00035 
00036 
00037 /* Maximal distance between two vertices in order to belong to the same 
00038  * pocket (single linkage clustering) */
00039 #define MAX_CON_DIST 2.5
00040 
00041 #define M_LIG_IN_POCKET_DIST 4.0  /**< maximum distance a ligand atom could have to a pocket barycenter to be considered inside the pocket*/
00042 /* -----------------------------INCLUDES--------------------------------------*/
00043 
00044 #include <math.h>
00045 #include <stdio.h>
00046 #include <stdlib.h>

00048 #include "voronoi_lst.h"

00051 #include "aa.h"

00056 /* ---------------------- PUBLIC STRUCTURES ----------------------------------*/
00057 
00058 /**pocket containing structure*/
00059 typedef struct s_pocket
00060 {
00061     s_desc *pdesc ; /**< pointer to pocket descriptor structure */
00062 
00063     c_lst_vertices *v_lst ; /**< chained list of Voronoi vertices*/
00064     float score,        /**< Discretize different parts of the score */
00065           ovlp,         /**< Atomic overlap     */
00066           ovlp2,        /**< second overlap criterion*/
00067           vol_corresp,  /**< Volume overlap */
00068           bary[3] ;                     /**< Barycenter (center of mass) of the pocket */
00069     
00070     int rank,                           /**< Rank of the pocket */
00071         size,
00072         nAlphaApol,                     /**< Number of apolar alpha spheres*/
00073         nAlphaPol ;                     /**< Number of polar alpha spheres */
00074 
00075 } s_pocket ; 
00076 
00077 /** Chained list stuff for pockets */
00078 typedef struct node_pocket 
00079 {
00080         struct node_pocket *next ; /**< pointer to next pocket*/
00081         struct node_pocket *prev ; /**< pointer to previous pocket*/
00082         s_pocket *pocket ;
00083 
00084 } node_pocket ;
00085 
00086 /** Chained list stuff for pockets */
00087 typedef struct c_lst_pockets 
00088 {
00089         struct node_pocket *first ; /**< pointer to the first pocket*/
00090         struct node_pocket *last ; /**< pointer to the last pocket*/
00091         struct node_pocket *current ; /**< pointer to the current pocket*/
00092         size_t n_pockets ;  /**< number of pockets in the chained list*/
00093 
00094         s_lst_vvertice *vertices ; /**< access to vertice list*/
00095 
00096 } c_lst_pockets ;
00097
